jcr:content.jcr:title: 2021 Altra Holiday Gift Guide

image.alt: Mountain scene with wrapped gifts in the forefront

text.text: GIVE THE GIFT OF GETTING OUT THERE

text_768063937.text:
The gift of Altra is so much more than a pair of shoes. Itâ€™s adventure. Itâ€™s discovery.
Itâ€™s fresh air. Itâ€™s new trails, new routes, and new finish lines.  

Whether youâ€™re looking for gifts for those who run the roads or those who take on
the trails, give the gift of getting out there. Find the perfect pair for all with our Holiday Gift Guide.

 

12-01-2021

text.text:
FOR THOSE WHO

RUN ROADS

For the pavement pounders ready to take on any road. Ready for the miles,
marathons, and everything in between. Run the road with the comfort you need to
move naturally.

image.alt: Woman running o n a road with two shoes lined up next to the running image

text.text:
FOR THOSE WHO

RUN TRAILS

For the dirt-diggers always seeking new challenges. The ones that call themselves
ultrarunners, trailblazers, and sight-seekers. Cruise the trails in unmatched
comfort.

image.alt: Man running on a trail with two shoes lined up next to the running image

text.text:
FOR THOSE WHO

HIKE

For the soil-sifters looking for the next adventure. From afternoon treks to day
hikes, to overnight excursions. Take on the trails with confidence.

image.alt: Woman hiking on a trail with two shoes lined up next to the running image

text.text:
FOR THOSE WHO

TRAIN

For the cross-training lovers. From box jumps, to burpees, to training
blocks. Get ready to work with our signature comfort.

image.alt: Man doing stretches o n a wall with two shoes lined up next to the image

text.text:
FOR THOSE WHO

MOVE IN STYLE

Whether youâ€™re looking for ultra-soft fleece hoodies, classic t-shirts, or functional
accessories, get ready to look your best wherever your run takes you.

image.alt: Man and woman in various apparel styles

text_copy_copy_copy_.text: SUBSCRIBE FOR MORE STORIES
